steps.title: Set Up Your Camera with the Recipe
steps.description: First, input all the parameters from this recipe into your camera, including White Balance (WB) and all Picture Profile settings.

steps.title: Access the Save Settings Menu
steps.description: Press the MENU button, navigate to the Shooting tab (pink) → Shooting Mode → Camera Set. Memory.

steps.title: Choose a Memory Slot
steps.description: Select one of the memory slots you want to save to (e.g., 1 or M1) and press the Enter button to confirm. Your settings are now saved!

steps.title: Recall the Saved Setting
steps.description: To use the preset, simply turn the top mode dial to the corresponding number 1, 2, or 3. The camera will instantly apply all your saved settings.
